title: Correction: Neural Substrates of Mounting Temporal Expectation
fullText:
Notice of Republication

This article was republished on 29 January 2021, to correct the online version of the article which displayed an incorrect Fig 1. The PDF version of Fig 1 was correct. The publisher apologizes for the errors.
